Web & Blockchain development
#Integrations
#Full-stack development
#Code refactoring

The powerful SPA app with 10k+ images was developed in 3 months time

Goal of the project

Our goal was to deliver a powerful app that would be able to handle upload of 10k+ images upon loading and real-time integration with Ethereum blockchain, but at the same time it had to be well-optimised and fast.

Our solution

For achieving these goals we've suggested to develop a bot that receives information from node about each new transaction in the mempool and identifies the liquidity refill transaction of a particular trading pair.

Technologies

Vue.js/Nuxt.js + Node.js (express.js), Web3.js, Graph QL

Benefit

After the development the project has been ready to launch.

Ann Smith

The Sniping Bot to buy new tokens

Goal of the project

Our goal was to deliver a bot hat will buy tokens
in the first block

Our solution

For achieving these goals we've suggested to develop a bot that receives information from node about each new transaction in the mempool and identifies the liquidity refill transaction of a particular trading pair.

Technologies

Desktop application for win/mac on Electron.

Benefit

The bot is successfully working and brings profit
